arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How did Carlisle United fare against Gillingham?
arts.sum: RATINGS: See how we scored Carlisle United's players in their Brunton Park stalemate against the Gills...

arts.ttl: Carlisle United denied in another home stalemate with Gillingham
arts.sum: REPORT: Carlisle failed to claim a sorely-needed win as they played out a second straight Brunton Park stalemate.

arts.ttl: League Two strugglers Carlisle and Gillingham play out goalless draw
Devitt gets first-team role under Hughes at Carlisle United
arts.sum: Jamie Devitt has stepped up to be a first-team coach at Carlisle United, the club have confirmed.

arts.ttl: Former Carlisle United defender makes Irish move
arts.sum: Former Carlisle United loan defender Seán Grehan has returned to his native Ireland in his latest move.

arts.ttl: Could Hughes remain at Carlisle United next season?
arts.sum: The signs are that Mark Hughes is ready to stay at Carlisle United for longer - but no talks will take place until the end of the Blues' survival fight.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United, Gillingham and a knife-edge title race
arts.sum: Imagine, if you can, the following scenario: Carlisle United smash seven goals past their sorry opponents at Brunton Park, yet many frustrated home fans leave the game early – and those who remain register their displeasure by slow-handclapping the team...

arts.ttl: Omari Patrick tells Carlisle United fan podcast he 'wanted to stay' at Brunton Park
arts.sum: FORMER Carlisle United forward Omari Patrick has told a fan podcast that he 'wanted to stay' at Brunton Park.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss sheds light on coach's departure
arts.sum: Mark Hughes says the departure of first-team coach Ian Watson was a decision motivated by the need for a “different dynamic and direction.”

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss responds to striker rumour
arts.sum: Head coach Mark Hughes today scotched rumours linking Carlisle United with free agent striker Connor Wickham.
